item.title: Python libraries for GraphQL
item.description: Python libraries for graphql GraphQL is emerging but very promising query language and execution engine tied to any backend service and was introduced by Facebook as an alternative to REST and it’s popular of flexibility on handling complex systems. Ariadne Ariadne is a Python library for implementing GraphQL servers using schema-first approach. Ariadne is a Python library for implementing GraphQL servers. Schema-first: Ariadne enables Python developers to use schema-first approach to the API implementation.
